Fraud Protection

How we protect your cards, crypto and personal data.

Card Security

Your Cards

All gift card code numbers are encrypted at AES-256 so no hackers (or admin) can see your cards. Our Trust Ratings and dispute process also protects your cards from scammers.

Learn about Encryption
Crypto Security

Your Bitcoin

Own your own wallet hosted on the blockchain with encrypted security keys, powered by Bcoin. Send, receive or earn bitcoin with 0% withdraw fees and fast transfers.

Learn about Bcoin
Data Security

Your Identity

Verify your identity (KYC) in minutes using our third-party Civic Mobile App available on any mobile device. We accept users in over 200 countries and territories globally.

Learn about Civic
